subSections.title: Synonyms
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|疣目|疣足|疣子|臀疣|附贅懸疣|贅疣|疣豬|濕疣|疣鼻天鵝|跖疣}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Wart}} {{wikipedia|Skin tag}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|いぼ}} A contraction of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=いぼ}}-derived {{m|ja|飯粒|tr=ihibo|lit=rice grain|pos=modern reading ''ībo''}}, from the way that a [[wart]] or [[skin tag]] may look like a grain of rice.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}{{R:Daijirin}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|疣の木|いぼのき}}: {{taxlink|Ligustrum obtusifolium|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a kind of [[privet]] tree
* {{ja-r|疣足|いぼあし}}: a [[parapodium]]
* {{ja-r|疣結|いぼい}}: a kind of [[knot]]
* {{ja-r|疣石|いぼいし}}: “wart stone” → a [[stone]] believed to have the power to [[cure]] warts
* {{ja-r|疣猪|いぼいのしし}}: a [[warthog]]
* {{ja-r|疣疣|いぼいぼ}}: a [[rash]] resembling many small [[wart]]s; a [[surface]] covered in small [[protrusion]]s
* {{ja-r|疣毟|いぼ.うじり}}: “wart plucker” → alternate name for {{m|ja|蟷螂|tr=kamakiri}}, the [[praying mantis]]
* {{ja-r|疣落|いぼ.おとし}}: “wart dropper” → alternate name for {{m|ja|蝦蔓}}, {{m|ja|蘡薁|tr=ebizuru}}: {{taxlink|Vitis heyneana subsp. ficifolia|subspecies|noshow=1|ver=170105}} (syn. {{taxlink|Vitis ficifolia|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}), a kind of [[liana]] related to the [[grape]]
* {{ja-r|疣蛙|いぼがえる}}: a [[toad]]
* {{ja-r|疣金物|いぼ かなもの}}: “warty metal” → a metal plate into which numerous round-headed [[rivet]]s have been driven, such as might be used in building [[construction]] or in [[shipbuilding]]
* {{ja-r|疣蟹|いぼがに}}: “warty crab” → a kind of [[king crab]], a member of [[genus]] {{taxlink|Paralithodes|genus|noshow=1|ver=170105}}
* {{ja-r|疣細螺|いぼきさご}}: a kind of [[marine]] [[snail]] in family [[Trochidae]]
* {{ja-r|疣草|いぼくさ}}: “wart weed” → {{taxlink|Murdannia keisak|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a type of [[flowering]] [[plant]] related to the [[dayflower]]
* {{ja-r|疣仙人掌|いぼ さぼてん}}: “wart cactus” → general name for [[cactus]] plants of genus ''[[Mammillaria]]''
* {{ja-r|疣痔|いぼじ}}: a [[hemorrhoid]], [[blind]] [[piles]]
* {{ja-r|疣地蔵|いぼ じぞう}}: “wart jizō” → a [[jizō]] [[statue]] believed to have the power to [[cure]] warts
* {{ja-r|疣占地|いぼ しめじ}}: “wart shimeji” → alternate name for {{m|ja|占地|tr=shimeji}}, the [[shimeji]] [[mushroom]]
* {{ja-r|疣症|いぼしょう}}: [[vercositas]], [[verrucosis]]
* {{ja-r|疣状|いぼじょう}}: [[verrucous]], [[verruciform]]
* {{ja-r|疣毟|いぼじり}}: “wart plucker” → alternate name for {{m|ja|蟷螂|tr=kamakiri}}, the [[praying mantis]]
* {{ja-r|疣毟巻|いぼじりまき}}: “wart-plucker curls” → a [[women]]'s hairstyle popular among [[rural]] women until the early {{w|Shōwa period}}, so named for a resemblance to the [[praying mantis]]
* {{ja-r|疣背|いぼぜ}}: “wartback” → alternate for {{m|ja|疣鯛|tr=ibodai}}: [[wart perch]], Japanese [[butterfish]]
* {{ja-r|疣取|いぼた}}: {{taxlink|Ligustrum obtusifolium|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a kind of [[privet]] tree
* {{ja-r|疣取の木|いぼたのき}}: {{taxlink|Ligustrum obtusifolium|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a kind of [[privet]] tree
* {{ja-r|疣鯛|いぼだい}}: {{vern|wart perch}}, Japanese [[butterfish]]
* {{ja-r|疣取|いぼとり}}: {{taxlink|Ligustrum obtusifolium|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a kind of [[privet]] tree
* {{ja-r|疣螺|いぼにし}}, {{ja-r|疣辛螺|いぼにし}}: {{taxlink|Reishia clavigera|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}} (syn. {{taxlink|Thais clavigera|species|noshow=1|ver=170105}}, a kind of [[predatory]] [[marine]] [[snail]]
* {{ja-r|疣虫|いぼむし}}: “wart bug” → alternate name for {{m|ja|蟷螂|tr=kamakiri}}, the [[praying mantis]]
* {{ja-r|疣毟|いぼむしり}}: “wart plucker” → alternate name for {{m|ja|蟷螂|tr=kamakiri}}, the [[praying mantis]]
* {{ja-r|疣目|いぼめ}}: a [[callus]], a hardening of the skin due to repeated rubbing or pressure
* {{ja-r|疣海楊|いぼやぎ}}: a kind of [[sea fan]], a member of order [[Alcyonacea]], formerly classed under order [[Gorgonacea]]
* {{ja-r|疣結|いぼゆい}}: a kind of [[knot]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|足底疣|そくてい いぼ}}: a [[plantar]] [[wart]]
* {{ja-r|副疣|ふくいぼ}}: a [[secondary]] [[tubercle]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|たり}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=たり|obsolete|rare}} a small [[protrusion]] of the [[skin]]: a [[wart]], a [[verruca]], a [[skin tag]]

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|ゆう|hhira=いう}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ゆう|rare|medical|only in compounds}} a small [[protrusion]] of the [[skin]]: a [[wart]], a [[verruca]], a [[skin tag]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|疣腫|ゆうしゅ}}: a [[sycoma]], a [[skin tag]]
* {{ja-r|疣状|ゆうじょう}}: [[verrucous]], [[verruciform]]
* {{ja-r|疣贅|ゆうぜい}}: a small [[protrusion]] of the [[skin]], more specifically caused by [[human papillomavirus|HPV]]: a [[wart]], a [[verruca]], a [[skin tag]]
* {{ja-r|疣贅症|ゆうぜいしょう}}: [[keratiasis]], [[keratosis]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|主疣|しゅゆう}}: [[primary]] [[tubercle]]
* {{ja-r|小疣|しょうゆう}}: a [[thymion]]
* {{ja-r|贅疣|ぜいゆう}}: a [[bump]] or [[knot]] of useless [[flesh]]; something [[useless]]
* {{ja-r|足底疣贅|そくてい ゆうぜい}}: a [[plantar]] [[wart]]
* {{ja-r|軟疣|なんゆう}}: a [[soft]] [[wart]], a [[molluscum]]
{{der-bottom}}
